name: Perl: Avoid Subroutines with a low comment/code ratio
description: Subroutines should be documented. This reports shows all the Subroutines with less than a defined comment / code ratio. This ratio is a parameter of the rule and can be changed at will.
output: This report lists all Subroutines that have a low comment / code ratio. It provides the following information: Subroutine full name, comment / code ratio
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are sufficient comments within the Artifact.
